name: obsidian-tree-search
description: All in one graph search, quick switcher, bookmark manager and MOC manager

scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:esbuild
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.release: npm run version && git add . && git commit -m 'release:main' && git push origin main:main -f && git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "$npm_package_version" && git push --tags
scripts.version:beta: node version-bump-beta.mjs && git add manifest-beta.json versions.json
scripts.release:beta: npm run version:beta && git add . && git commit -m 'release:beta' && git push origin main:main -f && git tag -a $npm_package_version -m "$npm_package_version" && git push --tags
